name: witch arena (demo)
description:
witch arena is a jam game made for the 7 day I want to make a game but i cant draw jam. I joined this jame beacuse one I dont have very good pixel art skils and beacuse the secret theme was optinal. the art for the charector was heavly inspired by the charector in the game micro mages. the full soundtrack that i used for this project comes from  https://thegirlwhoplaysalot.itch.io/chiptune-mix-music-pack

after the jam is done i will hopefully have an update for the game, I wont tell whats in store but its big
